HTML Input classes
HTMLInput
Base class for html inputs.
Properties
$name
The name/identifier of this input
$checks
A list of Checks entered values have to adhere to.
$required
Determines whether a value must be entered for this input
$inputType
The value of the ‘type’ attribute for an <input> tag.
$default
The default value for this input.
$formDataVar
The name of the variable that holds the pre-filled in values in the template.

For inputs with a limited set of values, adds a valid value.

HTMLInput

Base class for html inputs.

New input types should be derived from this class.  Note that an input is not limited to a single actual HTML input tag.

Due to the way inputs are created, all HTMLInput constructors must take the same parameters as this class.

Summary
Properties
$name
The name/identifier of this input
$checks
A list of Checks entered values have to adhere to.
$required
Determines whether a value must be entered for this input
$inputType
The value of the ‘type’ attribute for an <input> tag.
$default
The default value for this input.
$formDataVar
The name of the variable that holds the pre-filled in values in the template.
Functions
__construct
getName
Returns the identifier of this input.
addValue
For inputs with a limited set of values, adds a valid value.
setDefault
Sets the default value.
setOnChange
Adds a piece of javascript to this node’s javascript event that triggers when the input is changed.
makeRequired
Forces this input to be required.
isRequired
Returns whether this input is required.
addCheck
Adds a new Check that this input’s value should adhere to.
setFromProperty
Sets this node’s $checks, $required and values from a Property.
getGroupedChecks
Returns a list of this node’s checks, grouped by error message.
getErrorMsgs
Returns the error messages that can be generated for this input.
getRealCondition
Returns this node’s condition corrected for the value of $required.

Properties

$name

The name/identifier of this input

$checks

A list of Checks entered values have to adhere to.

$required

Determines whether a value must be entered for this input

$inputType

The value of the ‘type’ attribute for an <input> tag.  If inputs do not consist of a single <input> tag, this property is not relevant since they will have their own implementation of HTMLNode::getHTML.

$default

The default value for this input.

$formDataVar

The name of the variable that holds the pre-filled in values in the template.

Functions

__construct

public function __construct($name)

Parameters

$nameThe identifier of this input

getName

public function getName()

Returns the identifier of this input.

addValue

public function addValue(Value $value)

For inputs with a limited set of values, adds a valid value.  See HTMLOptionsInput::addValue.

setDefault

public function setDefault($value)

Sets the default value.

setOnChange

public function setOnChange($js)

Adds a piece of javascript to this node’s javascript event that triggers when the input is changed.  For most inputs, this is onchange, but for other inputs it may be different.

Parameters

$jsThe javascript to add.

makeRequired

public function makeRequired()

Forces this input to be required.

isRequired

public function isRequired()

Returns whether this input is required.

addCheck

public function addCheck(Check $check)

Adds a new Check that this input’s value should adhere to.

setFromProperty

public function setFromProperty(Property $prop)

Sets this node’s $checks, $required and values from a Property.

Parameters

$propThe property to copy values from.

getGroupedChecks

public function getGroupedChecks()

Returns a list of this node’s checks, grouped by error message.  This is used to reduce the amount of HTML output for errors.

Returns

An associative array of error messages to an array of Checks.

getErrorMsgs

public function getErrorMsgs()

Returns the error messages that can be generated for this input.

Returns

An associative array with the key being the error flag identifier, and the value the message to show.

getRealCondition

protected function getRealCondition()

Returns this node’s condition corrected for the value of $required.

Since being not required is a condition, the condition under which this node is valid must be changed in this case.

HTMLOptionsInput

Base class for multiselect inputs.  These are inputs where the user can only select from a limited set of values. e.g.  Radio buttons and dropdown boxes.

Summary
Properties
$values
A list of all the valid values
Functions
addValue
Adds a new valid value.
setOnChange
Sets this node’s state change javascript event.

Properties

$values

A list of all the valid values

Functions

addValue

public function addValue(Value $value)

Adds a new valid value.

Parameter

$valueThe value to add

setOnChange

public function setOnChange($js)

Sets this node’s state change javascript event.  For most multiselect inputs, this seems to be the onclick event.

HTMLInputFactory.

The factory to generate inputs.

Summary
Properties
$classes
A list of registered checks.
Functions
register
Registers a new input type.
create
Creates a new input.

Properties

$classes

A list of registered checks.  The keys of this array are the names of the checks as used in the form, the values are the associated class names.

Functions

register

public static function register($id,
$className)

Registers a new input type.

Parameters

$idThe name of the input as used in the form.
$classNameThe name of the class that handles this input.

create

public static function create($id,
$name)

Creates a new input.

Parameters

$idThe name of the input to create.
$nameThe identifier of the input.
